scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run uglify && npm run copy
scripts.uglify: npx uglify-js src/elm.js --compress 'pure_funcs=[F2,F3,F4,F5,F6,F7,F8,F9,A2,A3,A4,A5,A6,A7,A8,A9],pure_getters,keep_fargs=false,unsafe_comps,unsafe' | npx uglify-js --mangle --output src/elm.js
scripts.copy: mkdir docs && cp src/elm.js docs/elm.js && cp src/index.html docs/index.html
